description: The Donald R. Moses Memorial Scholarship is open to any full-time undergraduate or graduate business student with 30 hours of credit or more at the time of application. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate or Graduate business student Completed 30 hours Selection Process Preference given to students majoring in Management Information Systems or earning their Master of Science in Business Analytics (MSBA) Preference given to students with a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA or higher
